item.title: New Container: syslog-ng
item.description: We have released a new container for syslog-ng, which allows you to flexibly collect, parse, classify, rewrite and correlate logs from across your infrastructure and store or route them to log analysis tools.
item.content: We have released a new container for syslog-ng, which allows you to flexibly collect, parse, classify, rewrite and correlate logs from across your infrastructure and store or route them to log analysis tools.

item.title: New Container: Grav
item.description: We have released a new container for Grav, a Fast, Simple, and Flexible, file-based Web-platform.
item.content: We have released a new container for Grav, a Fast, Simple, and Flexible, file-based Web-platform.

item.title: New Container: AdGuardHome Sync
item.description: We have released a new container for AdGuardHome Sync, a tool to synchronize AdGuardHome config to replica instances.
item.content: We have released a new container for AdGuardHome Sync, a tool to synchronize AdGuardHome config to replica instances.

item.title: New Container: Sonarr
item.description: We have released a new container for Sonarr, a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
item.content: We have released a new container for Sonarr, a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
